name: Midelle and the Blessings Gone Wrong
name_original: Midelle and the Blessings Gone Wrong
description:
When your little sister steals the magical Staff of Power, it's up to you to track her down by following her chaotic trail of Blessings Gone Wrong.

A text adventure game with puzzles to solve, spells to untangle, and a great many animals to converse with.

...

Created in 72h for Inkjam 2022

A game by:

Holly Duncan

Julian Gosiengfiao

Matthew Watson-Jones

Nicotupe

Illustrated by Holly Duncan with additional scenery from Midjourney AI
